thread.title: Georgia dad accidentally shoots and kills daughter’s friend
thread.title_full: Georgia dad accidentally shoots and kills daughter’s friend

author: MINYVONNE BURKE
title: Georgia dad accidentally shoots and kills daughter’s friend
text:
Georgia dad accidentally shoots and kills teen boy his daughter snuck into home Georgia dad accidentally shoots and kills daughter’s friend Jordan Middleton, 17, was shot and killed by his friend’s father who mistook him for an intruder in their home. (Facebook) Tuesday, February 28, 2017, 9:25 AM 
A Georgia teen was shot and killed in a case of mistaken identity. 
Jordan Middleton, 17, was visiting his 14-year-old female friend at her parent's home early Saturday morning. 
Authorities said the girl snuck the teen into the house, and when her father, Derrick Fulton, heard noises downstairs he grabbed his gun and went to investigate. 
Fulton told police that the family's barking dog led him to the downstairs guest bedroom, ABC 7 reports . 
Houston girl, 8, shot to death after car crash 
According to the Columbia County Sheriff's Office, Fulton yelled that he was armed and said if someone was in the house, they should come forward. 
When no one came out, Fulton yelled the warning again and then went into the bedroom. Fulton said Middleton dashed out of a closet in the bedroom and Fulton fired a single shot hitting the teen in the chest. 
WRDW 12 reports that when police arrived to the home around 2:50 a.m. following a 911 call about a burglary, Fulton was performing CPR on Middleton in the foyer. 
No charges have been filed, and the shooting is still under investigation. Join the Conversation:
